types:type.name: json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type json = {| first: String, last: String, department: String |} {"example": "{\\\"first\\\":\\\"Adam\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Bob\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IIB\\\"}"}

types:type.name: update
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type update = {| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, first: String, last: String, department: String |} {"example": "{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"first\\\":\\\"Adam\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Bob\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IIB\\\"}"}

types:type.name: getusers
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type getusers = Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, first: String, last: String, department: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"first\\\":\\\"Adam\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Bob\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IIB\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":2,\\\"first\\\":\\\"Nathan\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Tadesse\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IT\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":3,\\\"first\\\":\\\"Noah\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Asmare\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"Developer\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":4,\\\"first\\\":\\\"Solyana\\\",\\\"last\\\":\\\"Solomon\\\",\\\"department\\\":\\\"IT\\\"}]"}
